talk.author: did:plc:drfmazaaqotnlkdoca3qpffp
talk.utter: Some communities have moved wholesale to Bluesky, with big upticks in engagement. Others are still patchy compared with Twitter. I used to run two sports Twitter accounts, and, right now, they'd only have a fraction of the engagement here. General Japanese language a/cs are still thin vs Twitter.

talk.author: did:plc:il7o6k67mod2k5vziz4mictg
talk.utter: Probably just a couple earthquakes away from a migration.

talk.author: did:plc:drfmazaaqotnlkdoca3qpffp
talk.utter: Yes, Bluesky still isn't good for live responses to breaking news and events. However, nor is Twitter these days. There's more chance of Bluesky getting better but there's a 60 second limit on video uploads. Coverage clips of the Haneda crash and Noto quake were generally longer than that.
